weekly_top_story.headline: Iran protests continue for 6th day as Trump threatens to intervene if peaceful protesters killed
weekly_top_story.summary: Protests in Iran have persisted for six days amid escalating tensions, with former U.S. President Trump warning of intervention should authorities harm peaceful demonstrators, potentially heightening U.S.-Iran geopolitical risks.

stories.headline: U.S. authorities say ISIS-inspired New Year’s Eve attack foiled in North Carolina
stories.summary: FBI and U.S. authorities thwarted a well-planned ISIS-inspired terrorist attack targeting a grocery store on New Year's Eve in North Carolina, underscoring ongoing global terrorism threats and effective law enforcement vigilance.

stories.headline: Scientists at St. Michael’s Hospital seek to revolutionize lung imaging
stories.summary: Researchers at St. Michael’s Hospital are developing advanced lung imaging technology that could transform diagnostics for respiratory diseases, promising earlier detection and improved global health outcomes.
